pages.text: When teaching Pet Rocks™ the $(bold)Find$() command, it is always important to be specific.$(br2)Failing to do so may result in your Pet Rock™ journeying to the ends of the earth to find enlightenment or religion.$(br2)Some claim that Pet Rocks™ that have found religion gain purifying powers, cleansing owners of some ailments when held.

Some owners claim that chewing on Pet Rocks™ performing this trick can satisfy hunger, but this is not recommended.$(br2)Ingesting even a small part of a Pet Rock™ can cause permanent damage to both your teeth and digestive track.
